title: LFM - Pool Party Event
body: Ranks don't matter. We are 3 Real Life Friends. We are looking for two more players (Preferably a bot lane) just normals or arams. Game mode doesn't matter too us. Just send me an invite and if we have room ill let you in. We use skype and you're more then welcome to come on in and chat with us.

replies.body:
Sent a friend request.
Mainly ADC but I can top or mid effectively too.
Will be very active after the 17th of June.
Happy to skype as well.
Cheers
hi guys im alex and im lvl 30 i really want to get all of the rewards :) username: i am alex123

Umm
Im LV 30, IGN: BobTheFaptron
used to be mid main, now jg main.
Im a friendly guy and nice.
Hopefully :)

Im interested in playing! Im only level 17 and still learning the basics, but if you guys are ok with that then i can play support or adc. I can get on later on tonight. Most likely in 2-3 hours. My summoner name is Oaklandish. Ill send you a friend request.
